alert.note: Alert for Ector; Howard; Midland; Mitchell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 29 at 7:31AM CDT until October 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT MONDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility half mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Howard, Mitchell, Ector and Midland Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 1 PM CDT Monday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
